attributes.action: properly fund St Peter's Hospital (Chertsey) and the Royal Surrey Hospital (Guildford) to ensure that the Accident and Emergency Departments remain open and serve the community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The loss of these two Accident and Emergency Departments leaves a hole in the A and E cover for people living in the Woking and Guildford areas.  The two departments cover busy stretches of the M25 and A3.  The proposed alternative A and E depts will be at Frimly Park Hospital 13 Miles from Woking or Ashtead Hospital near Terminal 4 Heathrow 15 miles from Woking.  The practicalities of reaching these alternative Hospitals puts lives at risk in a densly populated area.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
